meaningMnemonic: A <radical>drunkard</radical> goes down a <radical>slide</radical>, hits the <radical>ground</radical> and bumps straight into a <radical>woman</radical> of great stature. Imagine the shame. This drunkard has just lost all <kanji>dignity</kanji> and <kanji>might</kanji> that he may have possessed. And that drunkard… is you!
readingMnemonic: There’s only one thing you could think of that could possibly restore all your <kanji>dignity</kanji> and <kanji>might</kanji>: acquiring a pet <reading>ea</reading>gle (い).
